name: Dogr
description:
Dǿgr is a third-person action adventure featuring RPG elements with a stylized art style.

The player finds themself shipwrecked as a teenage boy on a distant island from home, where there is something wrong with the natural rotation sun and the moon and both day and night seem to be literally stuck in mid air.

This was a group project made within 12 weeks with a group of 7 people.

Designers

Jed Camilleri 

Brodie Harbridge 

Brodie White

Artists 

Katie Abela (Environment and UI)

Olivia Longo (Items

Daniel Booker 

Programmer

William Holman
